__TOC__

Ubuntu has been accepted as a mentoring organization for Google Code In for 2015! For more information, see the <nowiki>[[https://developers.google.com/open-source/gci/|Google Code In Page]]</nowiki>, or <nowiki>[[https://community.ubuntu.com/contribute/google-code-in/|the community site]]</nowiki>. Still have questions? <nowiki>[[https://developers.google.com/open-source/gci/faq|Check out the FAQ]]</nowiki>.

The contest runs from December 7, 2015 to January 25, 2016. We are looking for mentors to help create tasks and mentor the students. Interested? Read on!

== Keeping in touch ==
We'll be communicating via IRC and the mailing list. If you are interested in helping or volunteer to be a mentor, please subscribe to the list and idle in the channel.

<nowiki>[[http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=ubuntu-google|#ubuntu-google on freenode]]</nowiki>

and

<nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-soc|ubuntu-soc mailing list]]</nowiki>

== Sign me up as a mentor! ==
Excellent. Email the <nowiki>[[mailto:ubuntu-community-team@lists.ubuntu.com|community team mailing list]]</nowiki> or <nowiki>[[balloons]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[jose]]</nowiki>, or <nowiki>[[popey]]</nowiki> to be added to the site as a mentor and start adding tasks!

== Complete! ==
<nowiki>[[http://www.theorangenotebook.com/2016/02/google-code-in-2015-complete.html|Google CodeIn 2015 complete]]</nowiki> (external Link)

Google Code In 2015 is now complete! Overall, we had a total of 215 students finish more than 500 tasks for ubuntu! 
...

dated, February, 10 2016
